topics.body:
Hey guys, currently working with tanks and ponies. I've got a brilliant plan to wreck havoc in an uparmoured M-84 tank and roll around Equestria. It'd sure be fun scaring the hell out of ponies with a 125mm gun. 
And yeah, the fun thing about humanity, we can kick a lot of thing's asses, if all else fails, nuke. :D
